question: Indian National Congress was founded during whose term among the following in 1885?
explanation: The Indian National Congress was founded in 1885. Lord Dufferin was the viceroy that time. The first meeting of INC was organized by Allan Octavian Hume in Bombay with the approval of the Viceroy Lord Dufferin. Dufferin later said "Indian National Congress is a microscopic minority of India".
